entry.title: Fwd: [BIP 15] Aliases
entry.summary: In a discussion on the Bitcoin forum, Rick Wesson expressed his preference for using secured zones to publish TXT records to digital currencies, mainly in the context of using TXT format for Bitcoin. However, Luke-Jr cautioned against mixing up BTC (Bitcoin unit) with BC (Bitcoin in general/protocol) and pointed out the challenge of sticking to the standard best practice of using a new address for every transaction while using DNS. Rick responded by acknowledging that not everyone will follow the best practice he suggested.
